episode: I had to go in the basement for the first time in years. I avoided it for so long due to spiders and sure enough, there were a lot.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I just had to go in the basement. There were so many spiders. I haven't been that scared in years.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Spiders can be super freaky!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: How do I get rid of all of them for good? This is why I haven't gone in the basement for years.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Call an exterminator, maybe?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: What do they do? Just spray stuff?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Yeah, they seal entry points & use special treatments to keep 'em away.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Sounds expensive. But I don't want to be scared to go down there anymore.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Worth it for peace of mind, right?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: True. Why does it seem like everyone is scared of them?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Evolutionary thing, I think. Fear of venom & unknown.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I never even think about venom. Its just the look of them.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Their creepy crawly movement & legs freak people out

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah. I'd never be able to live in Australia due to them.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Redbacks & huntsmen, no thanks!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes. I just got chills thinking about it.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Brrr, sorry to give you the heebie-jeebies!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I guess I'll call an exterminator now.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Take back your basement!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: What about bug bombs? Maybe I could save money by doing that?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Bug bombs can be hit or miss, though.
